title: Blockchain As A Service
description: This is a project I developed for capstone. This provides safe storage and secure blockchain transactions for the clients

title: CO/CO2 ratio prediction for a blast furnace
description: I developed a machine learning model for predicting the ratio of CO/CO2 for a blast furnace to estimate the fuel consumption.

title: Chatbots using pre-trained LLMs
description: This project involves development of chatbots that interact with patients and give them insights on their medical condition, provide medication and book consultation with a relevent doctor
